docTitle.titlePart:
Color M-Mode Doppler Flow
Propagation Velocity is a Preload
Insensitive Index of Left Ventricular
Relaxation: Animal and Human Validation

byline.docAuthor:
Mario J. Garcia, MD, FACC,* Nicholas G. Smedira, MD, Neil L. Greenberg, PHD,* Michael Main, MD,*
Michael S. Firstenberg, MD,* Jill Odabashian, RDCS,* James D. Thomas, MD, FACC*

front.div:
OBJECTIVES To determine the effect of preload in color M-mode Doppler flow propagation velocity (v p ).
BACKGROUND The interpretation of Doppler filling patterns is limited by confounding effects of left
ventricular (LV) relaxation and preload. Color M-mode v p has been proposed as a new index
of LV relaxation.
